page.title: 18LIFE IN MIDDLEWICH
page.content: 33%{Middlewich}people have lived in the town since childhood 20% of these still live in their original house. Most adults are satisfied with the size of their homes and do their own maintenance.50% children have their own bedroom. Adults travel mainly by car, none by train. 98% children own a bicycle. Fish and Chips is the most popular take away food.Chinese food is popular with working adults 25% adults travel abroad on holiday.Gardening and knitting are favourite adult hobbies. Childrens favourite sports are swimming and football.Televison is the most popular home entertainment. 50% children have a home computer, 50% own a T.V. , 50% children never listen to radios, 50% retired people listen often. Love of animals is the main reason for keeping a household pet.5% of adults visit parents weekly.
